salaryExpectations: LKR 70,000 (Junior Animator) to LKR 550,000+ (Animation Director/Lead) per month.
futureOutlook: The biggest area of demand is in motion graphics for the advertising and television industries. There is also a growing animation studio scene in Sri Lanka, often working on international projects. This is a skill-based field where a strong demo reel is the most important asset for securing a job.
